{{Wireless embedded system |brand=Roku |model=2 |revision=(2720R) |upc=829610880501 |ean= |asin=B00F5NB7MW |price=79.99 |est_release_date= |fcc_date=09/18/2013 |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=No |manuf=Lite-On |manuf_model= |manuf_rev= |availability=common |type=media streamer |fcc_id=TC2-R1006 |ic_id=5959A-2720X |us_id= |pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp=1 |pwr_conn=barrel |cpu1_brand=Broadcom |cpu1_model=BCM7218 |cpu1_cspeed=600 |fla1=256 |fla1_brand=Toshiba |fla1_model=TC58NVG1S3HTA00 |fla1_num= |ram1=512 |ram1_brand=Samsung |ram1_model=K4B4G1646B-HYK0 |ram1_num= |expansion_if_types= |expansion_pcmcia_num= |expansion_expresscard_num= |expansion_minipci_num= |expansion_minipcie_num= |expansion_usb_num= |jtag= |serial= |wi1_module= |wi1_module_if= |wi1_chip1_brand=Broadcom |wi1_chip1_model=BCM43236B;BCM43236BKMLG, HT1308 P21, 270065 6 W; |wi1_802dot11_protocols=abgn |wi1_ant_conn= |wi1_txchains=2 |wi1_rxchains=2 |wi1_sstreams=2 |eth_none=true |eth_cpu= |eth_chip1_brand= |eth_chip1_model= |sw_cpu= |sw_brand= |sw_model= |lan_speed= |lan_ports= |wan_ports= |addl_chips=2.4/5GHz Front End Module;Skyworks;SE2577L;SiGe, 2577L, 249CN;2; |flags=HDMI out, composite AV |stock_boot= |stock_os= |tp_firmware= |802dot11_protocols=abgn |default_ssid= |default_ssid_regex= |default_ip= |default_user= |default_pass= |oui=B8:3E:59 |oui_eth= }} '''Streaming Media Player''' :[[wikipedia:Roku|'''Roku''' on Wikipedia]] :[http://support.roku.com/entries/20345913-Product-Comparison-All-Roku-Player-Models Product Comparison All Roku Player Models]
*This device may actually be the '''2720R'''. *"SWD216B_V03", "323G060333T7" and "Tyler2_C" is :silkscreened on bottom of the board in FCC photos. *The manufacturer stated in the FCC test report is :'''Dong Guan G-Com Computer Co., Ltd.''' :(presumably part of the '''Lite-On''' Group). *Power adapters specified in the FCC test report are... :''Roku'' FFA-1201000SUD (~120VAC/60Hz,0.5A - 12VDC,1A) :''Roku'' WA-12M12FU (~120VAC/60Hz,0.5A - 12VDC,1A)
